parameters.name: x
parameters.desc: A vector of strings naming the variables of interest in data

parameters.name: testvalue
parameters.desc: A number specifying the value of the null hypothesis

parameters.name: hypothesis
parameters.desc: 'different' (default), 'greaterthan' or 'lessthan', the alternative hypothesis; different to testValue, greater than testValue, and less than testValue respectively

parameters.name: effectsize
parameters.desc: 1 or 0 (default), provide Cohen's d effect sizes

parameters.name: ci
parameters.desc: 1 or 0 (default), provide confidence intervals for the mean difference

parameters.name: meandiff
parameters.desc: 1 or 0 (default), provide means and standard deviations

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed. It cannot be empty.
